directions: Heat the broth, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, carrot and celery in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil.
Stir the noodles and turkey in the saucepan. Reduce the heat to medium.  Cook for 10 minutes or until the noodles are tender.
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups Swanson® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Natural Goodness® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Certified Organic Chicken Broth
1 cup cubed cooked turkey or chicken
title: Sensational Turkey Noodle Soup
